trans-unit.source: Provides a permission structure that allows methods or classes to access configuration files.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma estrutura de permissão que permite métodos ou classes para acessar arquivos de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationPermission class provides a permission structure that allows methods or classes to access configuration files.
trans-unit.target: A classe ConfigurationPermission fornece uma estrutura de permissão que permite métodos ou classes para acessar arquivos de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Also, ConfigurationPermission provides ways to resolve multiple permissions values through such methods as <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Union%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Intersect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, ConfigurationPermission fornece maneiras de resolver vários valores de permissões por meio de métodos como <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Union%2A>e <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Intersect%2A>.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Intersect%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Union%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The permission level to grant.
trans-unit.target: O nível de permissão para conceder.

trans-unit.source: The value of state is neither nor .
trans-unit.target: The value of state is neither nor .

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> object with the same permission level.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um novo <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> objeto com o mesmo nível de permissão.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> with the same permission level.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> com o mesmo nível de permissão.

trans-unit.source: Reads the value of the permission state from XML.
trans-unit.target: Lê o valor do estado de permissão do XML.

trans-unit.source: The configuration element from which the permission state is read.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de configuração do qual o estado da permissão é lido.

trans-unit.source: securityElement is .
trans-unit.target: securityElementis .

trans-unit.source: The attribute for the given securityElement is neither nor .
trans-unit.target: The attribute for the given securityElement is neither nor .

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical intersection between the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> object and a given object that implements the <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a interseção lógica entre o <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> objeto e um determinado objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: Although the method signature accepts any object that implements the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception will be thrown if calling the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method on the object referenced by the `target` parameter does not return <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Embora a assinatura do método aceita qualquer objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Security.IPermission>interface, um <xref:System.ArgumentException>exceção será lançada se chamar o <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>método no objeto referenciado pelo `target` parâmetro não retorna <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> </xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: The object containing the permissions to perform the intersection with.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que contém as permissões para executar a intersecção com.

trans-unit.source: The logical intersection between the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> and a given object that implements <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A interseção lógica entre o <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> e um determinado objeto que implementa <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: target is not typed as .
trans-unit.target: targetnão é digitado como .

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> object with an object implementing the <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> objeto com um objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: Although the method signature accepts any object that implements the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception will be thrown if calling the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method on the object referenced by the `target` parameter does not return <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Embora a assinatura do método aceita qualquer objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Security.IPermission>interface, um <xref:System.ArgumentException>exceção será lançada se chamar o <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>método no objeto referenciado pelo `target` parâmetro não retorna <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> </xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: If the object referenced by the `target` parameter is `null`, the comparison is done between the permission state of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission> object and the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> value of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto referenciado pelo `target` parâmetro é `null`, a comparação é feita entre o estado de permissão do <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission>objeto e o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>valor o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>enumeração.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the permission state is equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estado de permissão é igual; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: target is not typed as .
trans-unit.target: targetnão é digitado como .

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the permission state for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> object is the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> value of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o estado de permissão para o <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> objeto é o <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref> valor o <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the permission state for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> is the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> value of <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estado de permissão para o <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> é o <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref> valor <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> object with attribute values based on the current <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"> </xref> objeto com valores de atributo com base na atual <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> with attribute values based on the current <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"> </xref> com valores de atributo com base na atual <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical union of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> object and an object that implements the <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a união lógica do <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> objeto e um objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: The object to perform the union with.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para executar a união com.

trans-unit.source: The logical union of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> and an object that implements <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A união lógica do <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> e um objeto que implementa <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref>.
